typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.pubmed.Header
typeDescription.description: The special Header for PubMed (http://www.pubmed.org) documents

featureDescription.name: citationStatus
featureDescription.description: Indicates the status of citation of a PubMed document

featureDescription.name: otherIDs
featureDescription.description: Other IDs (then the PubMed ID) may delivered by partners of the NLM to PubMed/Medline abstracts. If available, this feature discloses such other IDs and the respective sources.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.pubmed.ManualDescriptor
typeDescription.description: The special type for PubMed documents

featureDescription.name: meSHList
featureDescription.description: A collection of objects of type uima.julielab.uima.MeSHHeading

featureDescription.name: chemicalList
featureDescription.description: A collection of objects of type uima.julielab.uima.Chemical

featureDescription.name: dBInfoList
featureDescription.description: A collection of objects of type uima.julielab.uima.DBInfo

featureDescription.name: keywordList
featureDescription.description: A collection of objects of type uima.julielab.uima.Keyword

featureDescription.name: geneSymbolList
featureDescription.description: GeneSymbolList in PubMed

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.CitationStatus
typeDescription.description: A citation status (PubMed relevant)

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.pubmed.OtherID
typeDescription.description: PubMed/Medline abstracts sometimes have other IDs besides their PMID from different sources. This type discloses the respective ID and source. For details see https://www.nlm.nih.gov/bsd/mms/medlineelements.html#oid

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: The "other" ID of the document (e.g. Pubmed Central).

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source that assigned the ID found at the 'id' feature to this document.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.DocumentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The super-type for the document annotation types (Header, Descriptor)

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Header
typeDescription.description: The Header type stores the bibliographical document information.

featureDescription.name: docType
featureDescription.description: The type of the document (e.g. abstract, fulltext, randomized).

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source of the document (e.g. WWW, database, etc).

featureDescription.name: docId
featureDescription.description: The identifier of the document with respect to its source. E.g.: PMID in PubMed. In combination with the source, this is a unique identifier for a document.

featureDescription.name: copyright
featureDescription.description: Copyright information.

featureDescription.name: truncated
featureDescription.description: Indicates whether the document is truncated.

featureDescription.name: authors
featureDescription.description: The authors of the document.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: The title of the document.

featureDescription.name: pubTypeList
featureDescription.description: The list of the publication types.

featureDescription.name: language
featureDescription.description: The language of the document.

featureDescription.name: doi
featureDescription.description: document object identifier

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.PubType
typeDescription.description: An abstract type which should be used to store information on the publication. See subtypes Journal and an accumulative type (OtherPub)

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the publication type (e.g. journal, technical report, book).

featureDescription.name: pubDate
featureDescription.description: The date on which the document was published.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Journal
typeDescription.description: This type contains attributes to describe a journal publication.

featureDescription.name: ISSN
featureDescription.description: The international standard serial number.

featureDescription.name: volume
featureDescription.description: The volume number of the journal in which the article was published.

featureDescription.name: title
featureDescription.description: Full journal title.

featureDescription.name: impactFactor
featureDescription.description: The impact factor of the journal at the time of publication.

featureDescription.name: shortTitle
featureDescription.description: the short title of the Journal (e.g. "Nicotine Tob Res" for "Nicotine & tobacco research : official journal of the Society for Research on Nicotine and Tobacco")

featureDescription.name: issue
featureDescription.description: Issue of Journal

featureDescription.name: pages
featureDescription.description: Pages of Journal

featureDescription.name: nlmId
featureDescription.description: the nlm id of the journal

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Date
typeDescription.description: Type to store dates

featureDescription.name: day
featureDescription.description: day of the month.

featureDescription.name: month
featureDescription.description: month of the year.

featureDescription.name: year
featureDescription.description: full year (e.g. 2006 and NOT 06).

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.OtherPub
typeDescription.description: Accumulative type for all other types of publications

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Descriptor
typeDescription.description: An abstract type for the document descriptors, there are two subclasses: one for automatically acquired meta information and one for meta information that was added manually (such as e.g. MeSH term lists)

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.AutoDescriptor
typeDescription.description: The descriptor type for automatically (i.e. algorithmically) acquired meta information. It can be refined and extended.

featureDescription.name: documentClasses
featureDescription.description: Here the document classification result will be stored, for example for storing infos if the document is age-related or not.

featureDescription.name: documentTopics
featureDescription.description: A list of document topics derived from a topic model.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.ManualDescriptor
typeDescription.description: The descriptor type for the manually added information.

featureDescription.name: metaInfo
featureDescription.description: meta information about thos document, for example who is the annotator and which semantic types are annotated in this document

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.MeshHeading
typeDescription.description: Medical Subject Headings, see NLM's MeSH for a detailed description.

featureDescription.name: descriptorName
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: qualifierName
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: descriptorNameMajorTopic
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

featureDescription.name: qualifierNameMajorTopic
featureDescription.description: see MeSH

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Chemical
typeDescription.description: A chemical type

featureDescription.name: registryNumber
featureDescription.description: A unique 5 to 9 digit number in hyphenated format assigned by the Chemical Abstract Service to specify chemical substances, a zero is a valid number when an actual number cannot be located or is not yet available..

featureDescription.name: nameOfSubstance
featureDescription.description: The name of the substance that the registry number or the E.C. number identifies.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.DBInfo
typeDescription.description: References to other databases, e.g. SwissProt, INTERPRO e.g.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the DB referred to

featureDescription.name: acList
featureDescription.description: A list of accession numbers for this DB.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Keyword
typeDescription.description: A term of a controlled keyword list to describe the content of the publication.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the keyword.

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The keyword source (terminology).

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.DocType
typeDescription.description: The document type

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Language
typeDescription.description: The language of the document. Possible values: based on ISO-639-1 language codes; we start with a first selection (which might be extended later).

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.DocumentClass
typeDescription.description: A document class specification for the CAS' document text.

featureDescription.name: classname
featureDescription.description: The name of the document class this CAS has been classified to.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence value of the classification into this class.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.AuthorInfo
typeDescription.description: AuthorInfo Type annotates the text segments containing the information about an author and his/her affiliation information.

featureDescription.name: foreName
featureDescription.description: An authorâ€™s forename,C

featureDescription.name: affiliation
featureDescription.description: Affiliation of the author.

featureDescription.name: contact
featureDescription.description: Contact information (emails, phones, etc.).

featureDescription.name: lastName
featureDescription.description: The last name of the author.

featureDescription.name: initials
featureDescription.description: Initials

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.DocumentTopics
typeDescription.description: Topics label documents with vectors weights for their semantically most prominent words

featureDescription.name: Weights
featureDescription.description: Vector of weights denoting the semantical descriptivity of one word for the respective topic

featureDescription.name: IDs
featureDescription.description: IDs for topics determined by the modeling implementation

featureDescription.name: ModelID
featureDescription.description: ID identifying the model holding the topics to be labeled

featureDescription.name: TopicWords
featureDescription.description: The top words for the respective topic

featureDescription.name: ModelVersion
featureDescription.description: Version of the model holding the topics

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Annotation
typeDescription.description: The super-type for all types.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The component that made the annotation may put its confidence/score calculated internally here, O

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: Indicates which NLP component has been used to derive the annotation, C

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.DiscontinuousAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Chains annotations of the same type

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Annotations to be chained.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.ResourceEntry
typeDescription.description: The reference to an external resource

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The name of the resource, C

featureDescription.name: entryId
featureDescription.description: The identifier of the entry, C

featureDescription.name: version
featureDescription.description: The version of the resource, C

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.AbstractSectionHeading
typeDescription.description: The heading of a section of a structured abstract as used by MEDLINE and PubMed. The TitleType feature value should always be 'abstractSection'.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The author-given label to the abstract section this heading belongs to.

featureDescription.name: nlmCategory
featureDescription.description: The NLM category associated with the section label given by the authors (see feature 'label').

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.pubmed.InternalReference
typeDescription.description: Internal references with a special feature for PMC related reference types. It would be a cleaner class hierarchy if this annotation type would be a subtype of de.julielab.jcore.types.InternalReference. However, this won't work because this general purpose type does not have a restriction on the possible reference types. For PubMed/PMC we want to restrict the reference type to the ones valid for PubMed and PMC. But we cannot overwrite the base feature. Thus we can't extend the base InternalReference type but create a new one.

featureDescription.name: reftype
featureDescription.description: The reference type: literature, figure, footnote etc.

featureDescription.name: refid
featureDescription.description: The ID of the referenced object.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.pubmed.ReferenceType
typeDescription.description: A list of possible reference types specific to the PubMed InternalReference type. Includes the basic reference types plus some PMC specific ones.

value.description: Reference to an item of the bibliography.
A formular typeset for display. This mostly means that it is set on a line of its own with some padding using larger fonts.
Reference to a list or a list item.
A reference of another type than enumerated in this type.
Reference to a textbox or sidebar.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Paragraph
typeDescription.description: A paragraph is a self-contained unit of discourse in a written text dealing with a particular point or idea.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Section
typeDescription.description: a section is a part of the text that often has a heading, an id, a section type, figures, tables, citations and footnotes that occur in this section

featureDescription.name: sectionHeading
featureDescription.description: the title of the section

featureDescription.name: sectionType
featureDescription.description: the type of the section (e.g. results)

featureDescription.name: textObjects
featureDescription.description: the text objects (figure, table, boxed text etc.) that are associated with a particular section

featureDescription.name: sectionId
featureDescription.description: the id of the section, for example as mentioned in the original file, or level of the section

featureDescription.name: depth
featureDescription.description: depth of the section, e.g. 0 -> section, 1 -> subsection, 2 -> sub-subsection, ...

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The section label, if given. This might, for example, just be the section number.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Zone
typeDescription.description: A Zone is a distinct division of text. It is an abstract Type and provides a parent type for sub-types which represent various kinds of text zones.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Title
typeDescription.description: Title annotates titles covering various text units, including the whole paper, sections and subsections.

featureDescription.name: titleType
featureDescription.description: The type of the title: table: title of a table figure: title of a figure caption: title of a caption footnote: title of a footnote

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Caption
typeDescription.description:
the caption of figures, tables etc.
feature captionTitle is a Title-Annotation of the title of the caption, if existent.
feature captionType is an Enumeration, stating to what type of entity the caption belongs, e.g. figure or table

featureDescription.name: captionTitle
featureDescription.description: The title of a figure / table caption, if it exists

featureDescription.name: captionType
featureDescription.description: The type of entity, this caption belongs to, e.g. figure or table

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.TextObject
typeDescription.description: Object, on our case, are annotations such as figures, tables, boxed text etc.

featureDescription.name: objectType
featureDescription.description: such as figure, table, boxed-text etc.

featureDescription.name: objectId
featureDescription.description: the id of the object as found in the text

featureDescription.name: objectLabel
featureDescription.description: the label of an object

featureDescription.name: objectCaption
featureDescription.description: the caption that comes with the object

featureDescription.name: objectTitle
featureDescription.description: The title annotation of the text object, if it exists. The title might correspond to the objectLabel (which is of type String and thus no annotation on its own).

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.AbstractText
typeDescription.description: Annotation of the complete abstract.

featureDescription.name: structuredAbstractParts
featureDescription.description: A List of all parts of a structured abstract. Empty, if the abstract consists of only one part and has no titles.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Style
typeDescription.description: Text-markup information (italic, bold etc.) on any (e.g. character) level. Allows to keep the original style markup of the text, several style types might be set to same (or overlapping) range, when different styles are set to the same text region.

featureDescription.name: styleName
featureDescription.description: the name of the style used.

featureDescription.name: encoding
featureDescription.description: the encoding used.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Encoding
typeDescription.description: Encoding Information

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.List
typeDescription.description: used for annotation of lists

featureDescription.name: itemList
featureDescription.description: contains items of the level 1. The items of the level 1 could contain further items of next level and so on in order to represent an iterative structure of list items.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.ListItem
typeDescription.description: item of a list

featureDescription.name: itemList
featureDescription.description: items of the next level (sub-items)

featureDescription.name: level
featureDescription.description: Level of indentation of the list item.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.SectionTitle
typeDescription.description: Title of a text section in contrast to the title of the whole document.

featureDescription.name: depth
featureDescription.description: depth of the section, e.g. 0 -> section, 1 -> subsection, 2 -> sub-subsection, ...

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Figure
typeDescription.description: Annotation for all elements in the CAS that belong to figures, e.g. figure title, figure caption etc.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Table
typeDescription.description: An annotation for CAS elements that belong to a table, e.g. table title, table caption etc.

featureDescription.name: footnotes
featureDescription.description: An array collecting all footnotes, appearing in this table

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Footnote
typeDescription.description: Footnotes of all kinds, i.e. footnotes found in running text or in tables etc.

featureDescription.name: abstractSectionHeading
featureDescription.description: The title of a part of a structured abstract, e.g. "Background", "Methods", "Results", ...

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Bibliography
typeDescription.description: The whole bibliography, beginning with a title like e.g. References or Literature and ending at the end of the last reference.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.TitleType
typeDescription.description: The type of a title: abstract: title of an abstract or abstract part table: title of a table figure: title of a figure caption: title of a caption footnote: title of a footnote abstract: title of an abstract or abstract part document: title of the document

value.description: Denotes the heading of a section of a structured abstract

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.CaptionType
typeDescription.description: The type of entity the Caption belongs to, e.g. a figure or a table

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.Segment
typeDescription.description: A segment is comparable to "de.julielab.jcore.types.Section" but for medical document (e.g. discharge summaries) we want a distinction between these types

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: SecTag reference??

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.InternalReference
typeDescription.description: Used for document-internal references like literature references, footnotes etc.

featureDescription.name: reftype
featureDescription.description: The reference type: literature, figure, footnote etc.

featureDescription.name: refid
featureDescription.description: The ID of the referenced object.
